RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::AttributeModifierList

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::AttributeModifierList Class Reference

#include <attributemodifierlist.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::AttributeModifierList:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A list of attribute's modifier.

It keep in a stl list all the modifiers of an attribute and give the total of them. A modifier is in form +x or -x. x is an unsigned integer.

First, create an instance of AttributeModifierList. Then call addModifier with the modifier string. The refrsh methode is call automatically. You can get the total with getTotal(). You can also add the inverse of a modifier with addModifierInverse(std::string), when you want to remove it.

An unsigned modifier string is not added as we can know its sign. Unsigned modifiers are not considered to be positive modifiers.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::AttributeModifierList::addModifier ( std::string  mod  ) 

Add a modifier and refresh the total.

The modifier string is -x or +y. x and y are both integer. If the modifier is not signed (ex 25 ), it is not added.

Parameters:
mod The modifier string of a BonusFile's choice modifier.

Definition at line 53 of file attributemodifierlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::AttributeModifierList::addModifierInverse ( std::string  mod  ) 

Call this to remove a modifier.

You can't directly access to the list to remove elements. So call this function to add the inverse modifier. +2 becom -2 and it result as removing the modifier in the total.

Parameters:
mod The modifier string to remove (+2 will become -2)

Returns:

Definition at line 127 of file attributemodifierlist.cpp.

std::string RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::AttributeModifierList::getTotalString (  ) 

Get the total in a string format.

It the total is null (zero), the returned string is empty. If the total isn't null, The string returned contains the sign.

Returns:
The string of the total

Definition at line 140 of file attributemodifierlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::AttributeModifierList::refresh (  )  [private]

Calculate the total of all added modifiers.

All modifiers sign and values are added to the total integer. Use getTotal() to get the value of total.
